post.body: Went to charles russell, then verity for my 7th grade year, moved away and came back to blazer for my 11th and 12th grade years.
I did.. back in 2002.
I'm from Ashland, born and raised.. but live in San Francisco now.
Are there that many twitter users from Ashland or the surrounding tri-state area?;./l
Hahaha, that's why I started that as I did.. check on brightkite for the comment. LOL
Can you send just regular emails from the phone?
Yeah that might be your issue, I'm sure the MMS attaches a lot of stuff you're unaware of that messes it up.
Use growl for alerts + itunes.
Tweetie is a different iPhone app. A lot more powerful, quicker and stable than twinkle.
Should maybe tree tweetie?
Wow -- http://tinyurl.com/6rz9ap
And that last bit of text from my last tweet was from my cat walking across the keyboard. :sigh:
I have to hide things from my cats quite frequently, now I can't find half the stuff I've hidden. :sigh:
I had this dream last night..
I'm alive! I didn't die from the chocolate!
Already through half the pan!
Photo (http://bkite.com/032mF): Hurry up and cool down!!
Timer has started. I will have delicious brownies in 32 minutes.
about to try first stream on qik... with the iphone.
I just finished eating about 79 hershey kisses. I'm going to be sick here real quick, damn addicting things.
